website_summaries.verdict: A gentle yet powerful gel nail polish remover that won't leave your nails dry and brittle.
pros: Gel remover that's gentler than liquid acetone
Doesn't dry out your cuticles or leave your nails brittle
cons: Some feel the formula isn't as strong as pure acetone removers

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product from amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst products on amazon I’ve ordered . If I could give it no stars I would . The lamp to cure my nails doesn’t work at all . I tried drying my nails for 15 minutes and then nothing so I spent two hours drying my nails and it didn’t work at all. I had to completely remove the nail polish because of how wet my nails were . It was completely ridiculous and I’m disappointed amazon would sell such a terrible product to their customers and the design quality was that of a three year olds toy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Best nail polish ever
customer_reviews.text: Incredible gel polish manicure at home! As soon as you finish the three steps (base, color, top coat), wipe your nails with rubbing alcohol and they are totally set! It's a game changer. Plus the finish is shiny and gorgeous. I get so many compliments on my manicure all the time.
customer_reviews.author: dogtown

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It works just like the salon. I ever purchased gel polish from walmart and it did very well.The only thing I did different was keeping my nails under the light 4 times instead of the recommended time just to make sure they were dry.
customer_reviews.author: Uranda M. Mason

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect, it's beautiful, it's reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: Never expected it, but this gel base coat is FANTASTIC. I've used this now with Sally Hansen pro gel and All Season Professional gel, and it holds up beautifully. Pros: perfect brush, goes on so thin you'd wonder if it wants to talk with someone about it, stays where you put it, actually comes off when you take off your gel, smells like dry-erase markers (don't judge me) Cons:??? Get it. Don't look back.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Natural color
customer_reviews.text: I always trust the brand. The color looks very clean and nature.I like it.
customer_reviews.author: linlinkuo39

customer_reviews.title: You get the best value out of the lamp!
customer_reviews.text: The polish is ok. The lamp is amazing! I have had it for over a year and use it frequently. I even bought another to gift to my mother, as she would always ask what type of lamp/polish I use since she hasn’t had much luck in the past with similar products and was sick of going to the salon. She also loves it and agrees that this is worth it simply because of the lamp. I normally use Aimelli gel polish that I also purchase from amazon and it works perfectly with this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: M=MCsquared

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite gel polishes. So sad I can’t find this in stores anymore! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Hall

customer_reviews.title: not happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this remover for my gel nail polish and when I received the item the bottle was empty. Now I am having trouble reaching the sender so they can replace it. I know the product works great but to be honest you can get a can of acetone from home depot for the same price as that 4oz bottle and it works too. Both are 100% acetone and you will get 5000x's as much.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle

customer_reviews.title: Lasts over a week with zero chips, and two weeks with only minor chipping.
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent results if actually follow the instructions (push your cuticles back, have clean hands and use the alcohol pads to clean your nail beds, paint the polish over the edge of the nail). In the past two weeks (without gloves), I've handwashed the dishes daily, planted seeds, handwashed a tub full of laundry in a bleach solution, repaired a garbage disposal, scrubbed the bathroom and kitchen and I have a tiny chip on my thumbs and the rest of my nails are perfect. I'm seriously impressed. Came back six months later to write this review because I have put my hands through the wringer this week and my nails still look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: BAD
customer_reviews.text: Ugh... I had so many hopes for this gel😩 Anyway, applied as instructed... super easy to use, and everything in the kit worked... and this nail gel really doesn’t chip, but it PEELS OFF!!!!! The next day after applying it started to peel, so I had to take it it off completely, which wasn’t the best feeling ! Then the other Peeled off.... anyway, the ones that didn’t peel off did stay for over a week, but that doesn’t do any good😒
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No-streak beautiful sheer polish!
customer_reviews.text: My nails are very short and dry. I had to try something different to help them grow. I purchased this Sally Hansen (sheer ecstasy) polish along with an LED lamp and gel base/top coat. Tho is the first day of hopefully having my nails grow. The results are wonderful! The polish dried perfectly and evenly. I like the sheer polish especially with short nails. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MeliLes

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, Light only worked one time!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for the lamp as I initially bought a kit with only the 1 finger lamp, but that just takes a long time to complete a manicure. This lamp worked great!.... for 1 time. 2nd time I go to use it the lamp only blinks and will not work properly. $30 for a single time was totally not worth it. I'll continue to use the single finger lamp I've used for 3+ years and deal with the additional time or go to a salon for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to do my gel nails at home ...
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to do my gel nails at home and save some money. This stuff is PERFECT to achieve that goal. Really great base coat.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like there aren't too many steps. This is as easy as removing normal polish. Just wish the bottle was bigger and the price was comparable to acetone. Love, no foil is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Favorite red sally color
customer_reviews.text: I started out doing my own gel nails to cut down on how much I was spending at the salon over the years. The sally LED lamp kit was a good place to start, and my kit included this color. I’ve tried all of the red Sally colors and this is by far my favorite, especially around the holidays. It has good dimension and is subtly glittery dimension (but not childish) that I haven’t found with the other reds. They tend to look dull or old within a day, in my opinion. This is also a great price.
customer_reviews.author: queenfrost

customer_reviews.title: Polish color is differant
customer_reviews.text: Ok so i have the whole Sally Hansen kit with the lamp and all it is amazing!! This product is great however, the box should indicate that the color of the polish is Shell We Dance. I was a little disappointed because I already had that color. Had i known i would not have purchased it. That being said the seller was amazing and refunded my money the next day, apologized, and told me to keep the polish.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Works But Box looks like it came from garage sale
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as a Christmas gift - it works, thankfully, but the box looked like it came from a garage sale and was old. The box was yellowed, torn and not in good shape. It was a little embarrassing to give as a gift - therefore I can't give this a high rating for Savy Deals - for the product itself, I would give it a four star.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mommy!

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I used to go to salons every other week and pay around $30 each time. I bought this kit and LOVE it! The key is just thin applications. I add 1 application to the color step just because I like more pink, then I repeat the lamp an extra time at the end just for safe measure. This lasts just as long as a salon visit!!! I've already done my nails about 4 or 5 times with this starter kit! I highly recommend it. It only takes me about 20 minutes to do it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kim Gambrell

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy and simple
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy and neat my nails turned out! My coworker recommended it and now I don’t have to go to the salon And spend money. I gave it 4 stars because the polish were smaller than expected, but it does the trick, so can’t really complain much. I am so excited to get more colors! EDIT The photo with the dark background are my nails 7 days from first. It’s still on! There were some slight chipping on my other hand but was able to fix it by filing my nails down.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvanna-banana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Quarantine Mani
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly loved this product. I was super excited for it to come in, but I was wary of how well it would work. Followed all of the listed steps to a T. Used super thin coats, and I am really happy with the results! My nails look very polished and are feeling just as strong as they do in the salon. The only thing I’m waiting for now is to see how long they will last and how easy it is to remove, but otherwise, I am extremely pleased with the results! Going to try on my toes this week, too. Perfect quarantine mani.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: It's absolutely a must-have if you love gel nails and go to a salon every two ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my kit a few days ago and just had time today to do a manicure. It's absolutely a must-have if you love gel nails and go to a salon every two weeks. It works perfectly. I do strongly suggest you follow the instructions completely, to the letter. Make sure you wipe around the edges each time you put on a coat before curing. Love this product. Beautiful, looks professional. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Home shopper

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I'll be looking for something else to try. It works okay, but I've seen bigger bottles for just a couple more bucks with better reviews. It did take my polish off after 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Strenkowski

customer_reviews.title: Old, thick polish
customer_reviews.text: Returned. The polish was old and thick. I even used a hobby paint shaker but I could never achieve a smooth consistency. The bottles are labeled poorly. Once the plastic seal is removed and thrown away, there's no indication which is the base and which is the top coat.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bottle of gel polish
customer_reviews.text: Box looked either very old or possibly stored in a humid environment. Did not use this until many weeks after purchase. All my other sally Hansen gel polish have worked beautifully but this particular bottle did not fully cure with the light. Finished nails had soft and gooey polish that I could actually move under the top layer. It started to peel off instantly and it was a gooey oily mess all over my hands. Took a long time to get this product completely off my nails and hands. I think this product possibly could have been tampered with. I will attempt to return it. Will not buy from this particular vender again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is the bottle is too small. I wish they'd make a larger bottle because I'll end up making purchase after purchase! I love this product though as I do my nails every few weeks and this is perfect to give my nails the great and natural look!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this. Not sure how everyone is raving about it but the UV light is poor, it doesn’t dry the colors which prolongs the process. My nails only lasted about a day or two. It doesn’t dry quick and it’s not the easy application I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Canto

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really excuited about using this. After opening the box and inspecting all the items that were included with the kit I noticed that the incuded acetone was empty! Not cool! This was pretty pricy compared to the Sensationail® Polish to Gel Transformer Kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. LOVE. LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this color. To make it last as long as possible I recommend filing nails so they are nice and gritty to get the base coat to really stick on the nail. Apply the Sally's hansen base coat. And to get the color I desire I do 3 thin coats. So it doesn't have any spots you can see through to the nail. And then apply the sally hansen top coat for a nice shine. Great price, great product.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: The bottle was empty
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box and bottle to do my nails, and it was completely empty. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Mrs L.

customer_reviews.title: Like it for adding sparkle to an opaque
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s not as opaque as pictured. It’s almost clear with little flecks of gold and larger silver glitter. I put 5/6 layers on by itself OR used a pink opaque coat before 2 coats of this for some fun glitter.
customer_reviews.author: AlexM

customer_reviews.title: Kinda sheer color, but great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tools! Very easy to use, the only complaint is the color it comes with (shell we dance) is very sheer. It’s okay because it looks like I have a French manicure after 2 coats! I purchased other colors to use with this kit
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: Base coat goes on easy and replacement bottle for kit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the full gel kit years ago, and I'm glad to see individual bottles (base cost, polish color, and top coat) for sale. The base coat was the first to become empty for me. The base coat goes on easy and stays on with proper prep for a week or more for me. Removal is not as easy unless you soak it off, but I don't prefer that method. I usually peel off the layer. I wear very light polish so it isn't as noticeable when it begins to peel.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mills

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gel polish
customer_reviews.text: Love Sally Hansen gel polish. Easy to use, doesn’t clump, isn’t runny - just perfect consistency. This three pack was a savings in comparison to what you see in a brick and mortar. Typically stays on for a pretty solid 10 days or so.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Very light, almost-white with slight pink-grey tones
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a light grey color but I'm still happy with this. It serves well as a white polish, great for summer. It's better than the actual whites I've purchased because two coats are sufficient for full coverage with streaks.
customer_reviews.author: dogtown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, love the colour. Very long lasting. Sally Hansen is by far the best gel polish brand that Ive tried thus far. Oh...may not last full 2 weeks but likely 9 to 12 days without any chips. The thinner you do the polish, the longer it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sally hansen gel polish remover
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this gel polish remover! I wish they made it in a bigger bottle! It has no acetone! Smells great! I am sensitive to smells- this is why it is very important for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: The polish popped completely off just a day after applying it. It doesn’t even look like it was ever polished. Certainly doesn’t last the promised 14 days. Otherwise works fine and applies easily, but not worth the money. This is the second color I’ve purchased to have this happen. Won’t be buying any more.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get the Sally Hansen Salon Pro-Gel Base Coat. Because I've been using a non-name brand for years so I expected this to work 10 times better. Unfortunately, I can hardly get my nails to last a day after using (which I was able to get like 2 weeks out of the other basecoat).
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: UV Light Sucks
customer_reviews.text: The uv light is not strong enough to really cure the gel. I would paint my nails and 2 days later it’s peeling off. I even tried to do extra time under the light and still doesn’t last longer. Really disappointed this doesn’t qualify for a return cause it’s definitely not worth $45
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! For the price of one trip to the salon I can do it myself. Easy to use and lasts about a week. I use regular polish as the color for now until I buy more.
customer_reviews.author: runalattemomma

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This polish glides on well and cures without bubbles. It sticks for up to two weeks. Use thin layers and cure between coats. It soaks and peels off with no issues. It is my favorite brand and I have used many!
customer_reviews.author: Cayte

customer_reviews.title: Not Harsh on hands
customer_reviews.text: I Needed to remove gel nails, This worked well. Pleasant smell wasn't harsh on my nails. Price was right. This size bottle was just enough to remove gel nails from both hands
customer_reviews.author: g girl

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: I have gel nails now...for around 5 dollars/set...and don't have to go to the salon! Works as well as it does in the salon. I'm a happy buyer. The color that comes with it is a bit too soft pink for my liking but it's a nice neutral color but I will be getting some other colors to use. The light works well. You press a button and after 30 seconds it automatically shuts off. They say in the directions you don't need any more than 30 seconds and based on the strength of my nails it appears that is true.
customer_reviews.author: mommamiaa

customer_reviews.title: Came empty
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt try it because i recieved an empty bottle. Nothing in it, please get back to me so i can get a new product, or get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: destiny ♡

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, saves $ and trip to salon
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. First photo is the day after, and the second is a week later. No chips or lifting so far. I wash dishes do chores etc every day, no gloves or anything. Looks like it's gonna last. A touch of cuticle oil goes a long way in making your nails look brand new. They could probably put in more product in the gel top coat and base coat, there's not much in there. Bottles weren't even full when I started. UPDATE: last photo is exactly 2 weeks after, my first chip. At least they stayed longer than any other manis.
customer_reviews.author: Hzchn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: In my Area a gel polish cost 18 dollars and a Gel pedicure is 40 + a Tip. This has definitely paid for its self already. The polish on my hands last 2 weeks(sometimes more) and my toes last 3 to 4 weeks. The polish come with the kit will probarly last up to 15 times so you will need to buy more but you don't necessarily need to buy a polish by the sally Hansen brand. You can buy any brand polish and it will work fine. I would say definitely give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: dania gomez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect set to start doing your nails at home! The lamp is a good size to store, use and travel with. I got the color "wine not". Very easy to use, instructions are easy to follow and the price is great for all it comes with. There are also YouTube videos specially on this set for more guidance. Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this color. It is more of a maroon/blood sort of color. For some reason I was thinking Pat on the Black would be Black. Other then that perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The bottle contains just a small amount and it doesn’t last that long but only around one week if you are very careful to not wash your hands with warm water. It’s a expensive product so I think they should improve it a lot more
customer_reviews.author: Karla Perez

customer_reviews.title: I love this kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit. I have very weak fingernails and when I do house work my nails always just bend and peel off they are so thin when I put them in water and do alot of scrubbing. This gel polish stays on for weeks.....I paid to have the gel manicure and a pedicure and the gel last for a long time. I save alot of money doing it my self and they make my nails stronger and they grow longer.
customer_reviews.author: wrightway10

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: First time doing my own Gel manicure and I still have some techniques to learn; however, this product is amazing! I am horrible on nails...constant keyboarding, using my nails as tools, etc. and this product has certainly lived up to the hype! 1 week into my manicure and the Gel polish hardly shows any wear. LOVE IT!! Would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ford

customer_reviews.title: cant use
customer_reviews.text: i had my nails done on a trip to AZ. Loved it. I can't use this because I need the light which I don't have. Fo love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Parton

customer_reviews.title: If you can paint your own nails, buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I love gorgeous gel nails, but hate going to the nail salon to get them done. If you know how to paint your own nails, this is a god send! Works great not to mention you will save $$. Don't be afraid to cure your nails an additional 30 secs after applying the first and second color coat. After nearly 2 weeks my nails are still nice. Usually when I have traditional nail polish on, my nails will look like hell after 4-5 days. Not anymore. I love this product. Thank you Sally Hansen!
customer_reviews.author: Kay From L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I received this for Christmas and I love it! It is easy, fast and looks professional. Manicure lasted 2 weeks without wearing gloves while doing the dishes or other household chores. So shiny and so easy to use. Removal was not as difficult like in the salon. left cotton balls on nails with the remover it came with after 15 minutes the polish lifted off no scraping necessary. So happy and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: great color works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love my sally Hansen gel kit, I haven't had to get my nails done at a salon for months, this has saved me a ton of money!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This Product is Terrible with a capital T! Truthfully I am shocked since Sally Hansen is a reputable company. I never should have purchased WASTE OF MONEY 😠
customer_reviews.author: Millard Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Was not worth the trouble it didn’t even last four days😡😡😁😡I think I should get some credit for this product
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: Way small !
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet- just arrived today - but super disappointed in the size. Half the size of the one you buy in the store.
customer_reviews.author: PENNYMH

customer_reviews.title: The solution leaked
customer_reviews.text: The cap was not on tight and the solution leaked through the plastic bag. It was literally half full and it is already a very small bottle. Also, it did not take the gel off my nails and with the pandemic, my nails have not had polish on since the beginning of March so the solution should have taken off the worn gel on my nails. very disappointed to say the least and would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Vahe G.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is awful my manicure only lasted 2 days max
customer_reviews.author: WellnessK

customer_reviews.title: Heck no
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried and re-tried this product and it doesn’t work well, maybe it’s just that the instructions aren’t as informational as they can be. But it would not recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Morisette

customer_reviews.title: Not my Pat on the Black
customer_reviews.text: Gel with UV Light went on nicely. I'm excited to see if it lasts the 2-4 weeks like the salon. The color is very much like a garnet or wine color. Not like my other bottle of sally Hansen "pat on the black". Very disappointed in the color not being what I expected. Seller was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin E. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gel nails
customer_reviews.text: Love this gel nail kit! It goes on so smoothly and lasts a long time. The color Shell We Dance is pinker that I thought it would be from the picture on the box but I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for people looking into gel polish at home. Very affordable and comes with everything that you will need!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Fouts

customer_reviews.title: Base coat is good
customer_reviews.text: It definitely improved the life and longevity of the color. The top coat is not as good
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie N.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: These wipes don't do anything at all to remove nail gel. Completely useless. Save for money.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia M. Earheart

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: So I really wanted to love this gel polish and was excited to add it to my collection. This color in particular was very difficult to apply an even coat to all of my nails. It also seemed to peel off very easily compared to other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and easy application. Hopefully it’s easy to remove and it’ll last long as it says.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great color but the quality is just not very good. Mine chipped easily and got stained really easily too. I’ve been getting gels for a decade and I’ve never had that happen
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as expected
customer_reviews.text: Just tried to use this for the first time. Followed directions and gel polish didn't come off easily. I had to file it off anyway. For the money I'd rather use regular acetone polish remover.
customer_reviews.author: Elana

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really great UV lamp and nail polish kit for the price. Easy to use even on your non dominant hand, does exactly what it says. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Johns

customer_reviews.title: Loved this kit
customer_reviews.text: Loved this kit. Really easy to use, nails dry quickly and look great. The color is very sheer and more pink than I expected, still looks good just lighter than the box shows. The alcohol pads seem to be expensive to replace beyond this kit, you can use regular isopropal alcohol instead and also buy your own acetone remover. Be sure to clean your cuticles nicely and wipe off excess before you cure-- a hangnail on my pinky got cured into the polish and made it bumpy but other than that- works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Discontnued.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Discontinued and I know why ... too few colors, and the polish bottles get really gloppy, even tho you try to tighten them.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Reader

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. More cost effective than going to salon. Color does not last two weeks. Usually peels off within 5-8 days.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper to do it at home then go to a salon! LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Raechel W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Paid for itself. I think my nails look just as good as the salon. I had to leave it under the light a little longer than it said, but other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT, HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product of Black Friday and received at the beginning of December and have only used it twice and it is ALREADY BROKEN. The light is supposed to be timed so you know how long to keep your nails in but now it is broken so the light only stays on when you hold the button down. When I contacted the seller, their reply was to say their product was new and made it very clear they are unwilling to help me. THIS PRODUCT BROKE WITHIN A MONTH, DO NOT BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Marlais

customer_reviews.title: Dc plug issue... strobe party
customer_reviews.text: New, arrived on-time. Dc plug was defective... but luckily I can use my plug for my mini speaker. The plug it came with turned it into a strobe light that wouldn't turn off. This particular color is light pink and looks like a French manicure
customer_reviews.author: Allison foster

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I watched the videos and followed the instructions on how to apply, but every time the nail polish only lasted 1 day. In one case I put it on for a wedding and it only lasted a few hours, started to peel off after I washed my hands. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dante Paladino

customer_reviews.title: Its just ok!
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, just have to put nails under lamp more than what it says.
customer_reviews.author: C1022

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know much about doing nails but tried this as an attempt to fix my nails...easy to use. No mess. No smudge. Lasted a few weeks before I started to pick and peel.
customer_reviews.author: Cad1979

customer_reviews.title: Great product, too pricey
customer_reviews.text: I gave it three stars because of the price. It works and lasts just like what you'd get from a salon but you're doing the labor yourself so it shouldn't cost as much.
customer_reviews.author: Bible student

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use just wish it would last
customer_reviews.text: Did everything by the directions and still only last 3 days. Very easy to use just wish it would last longer
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine manicure essential
customer_reviews.text: If you’re doing at home gel manicures right now, you need this! Especially if you’re quarantined and can’t find alcohol to use, these already have it in the cloth so it makes it so easy! I use these before my ph bonder to help my gel even more
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Gel polish
customer_reviews.text: This was not a polish...it wiped right off..terrible...I threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: works well for the Sally Hansen gel kit
customer_reviews.text: works well with the 3 step sally hansen gel kit
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: The easiest polish remover I've tried. And smells very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Nichol Williams

customer_reviews.title: Favorite color to wear
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite color to wear from this line of gels. I always get compliments on it and it looks beautiful on.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Hall

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited to get this and the reviews were good. I followed to directions perfectly and my nail ...
customer_reviews.text: Wondering if I got a lemon? I was so excited to get this and the reviews were good. I followed to directions perfectly and my nail color comes off before it has even been on for 24 hours!! So frustrating! I bought a couple other colors to see if that would make a difference and had the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Molly O Barker

customer_reviews.title: Not the best. Invest in a better heat lamp
customer_reviews.text: The heat part of the lamp really doesn’t seem like it works. I’ve even tried using it to dry the polish over five times after putting on the top coat and it’s still not dry enough. So that’s disappointing. The nail polish itself seems to last longer than regular nail polish but still hasn’t lasted me even a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Allen

customer_reviews.title: NOT SALON QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for salon quality go modelones. It's a quarter of the price. Was not impressed w the polish. It was watttery which overflowed on my cuticles I could go on and on. Didn't feel like a salon gel mani. Go w diff brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The lamp does not work and won’t cure nails. I just got this and have been desperately trying to get my nails to cure and it’s just not happening. Waste of money PLUS it’s not eligible for returns since it contains flammable items. They can ship it to me with the flammable items but it can’t be shipped back. COOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price of just the UV light, I got the light, top and base coat, color, orange stick, nail file, cleaning pads and acetone. The UV light is not as strong as a professional one, naturally, but it was easy to compensate by setting the color with two or three times under the light - and the result is the same as from the salon! I was impressed with the unit and it's already paid for itself!
customer_reviews.author: K. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Polish
customer_reviews.text: Currently wearing this nail polish and I love it! The coats are nice and thick appearing, even without a lot of polish used. I have used this with the Sensationail Gel Light and the polish lasts between a week and a week and a half depending on my weekly activities. I would definitely buy this product again and have recommended it to many friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gel kit! It’s really easy to use and my nails actually last a solid 2 weeks without chipping or dullness. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Finally, my nails look good again!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever paint my nails, because it lasts about 12 hours before it starts chipping, no mater how many coats I use. I've been looking for something that would help the polish last longer, and I have to admit, I was skeptical about this product. I am pleasantly surprised!! The directions were easy to follow, and the results were great! I am on day 9, and am just now starting to see a few small chips in the polish. This was exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: NWMama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just like the pic. Secure packaging, love it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Samira Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors and the machine works perfectly, but nail polish doesn’t stay longer.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Castillo

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have if your using sally's Miracle gel Polish.
customer_reviews.text: I just may never go back to regular nail polish. Yes I am a Sally Hansen Miracle Gel addict.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY L BRUNOW

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Not worth your money time,or afford used over half bottle half hr sitting with cotton balls and aluminum foil, holding it down polish still there,didn't do anything
customer_reviews.author: C. Price

product_meta.title: Sally Hansen Salon Pro Gel Cleanser, 20 Count (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description: Color:Cleanser| Size:20 Count (Pack of 1)Bring the salon to your home. With Sally Hansen Salon Pro Gel Nail Polish Remover Fluid, you can enjoy professional results without stepping out the door. This nail polish remover erases salon gel polish easily and quickly. It also rejuvenates your cuticles with an acetone formula containing a nourishing emollient. For the best results, use with the Sally Hansen LED lamp, gel base, and gel top coat.
feature_bullets: MANICURES DONE RIGHT: Sally Hansen Salon Pro Gel Nail Polish Remover Fluid is a manicure essential
THE SALON COMES TO YOU: Professional salon results at home
WORKS FAST: Removes salon gel polish easily and quickly
REVIVE YOUR CUTICLES: Contains an emollient for nourishing cuticles
GO THE SALLY HANSEN WAY: Use with Sally Hansen LED lamp, gel base, and gel top coat

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
